      • getArtistsResource

        public ArtistsDTO getArtistsResource(java.lang.String characters,
                                     java.lang.Integer pageSize,
                                     java.lang.Integer pageNumber)
        Get artists parsed from the LastFM service.
        Parameters:
        characters - The characters to filter by.
        pageSize - The amount of artists to show per page.
        pageNumber - The current page.
        Returns:
        Artists.
        See Also:
        artistsParser, lastFM

      • getArtistResource

        public ArtistsDTO getArtistResource(java.lang.String name)
        Get an artist parsed from the LastFM service.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the artist.
        Returns:
        An artist.
        See Also:
        artistsParser, lastFM
